title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.16.0.66 发布
author: FaceTime
txt_content:
本帖最后由 FaceTime 于 2020-6-6 11:20 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft基岩版 1.16 仍未发布，1.16.0.66为其第11个测试版。

转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360044492151-Minecraft-Beta-1-16-0-66-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-
Fixesbug修复
Performance and Stability性能和稳定性Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩中可能发生的崩溃Fixed a crash that could occur when attempting to create world with the Tropical City Resort mash-up pack修复了在用热带城市度假村混搭包创造世界的发生的奔溃Fixed an issue that could cause a hang on start up when trying to open certain worlds修复了打开特定世界卡死
General常规Fixed an issue with projectiles being destroyed prematurely if they didn't deal damage. This is now optional with the addition of 2 new flags to the projectile修复了弹射物没有造成伤害就提前被摧毁。现在可以在弹射物可以添加2种新标志
Gameplay游玩Fixed an issue that could cause chests to generate without loot MCPE-69003修复了箱子生成的时候没有东西的问题MCPE-69003
Graphical图形Fixed rendering issues while riding a mount修复了乘骑时的渲染的问题
Add-Ons and Scripting附加包和脚本Fixed an issue that could occur when the movement component is removed, meaning that a mob's speed has to ramp up from 0 again修复了当生物行为文件被移除时，这意味着生物的速度必须从0开始加速Changes to components: set_last_hurt_requires_damage and destroy_on_hit_requires_damage. Each defaulting to true to respect old behavior, but can now be set to false if it is desired to have a projectile that is destroyed even when it doesn't deal damage基础组件的改动：set_last_hurt_requires_damage and destroy_on_hit_requires_damage. 为了尊重老版本的方式默认为true，但是现在可以设置成false了，如果你希望弹射物没有造成伤害时也被摧毁。
Commands命令Added new overload for /replaceitem with an option for destroy (the old behavior) or keep (the command will return an error if an item occupies that slot)指令/replaceitem 增加了新的选项。可选destroy（旧版本的方式）或者keep（如果某个物品已经位于这个栏位，就会报错）Fixed a bug where a mob wouldn't delete its goal if all goals were trying to be removed修复了如果全部目标都尝试被删除，一个生物就不会去删除它的目标Fixed spamming of particles, sounds, and events for looped, non-zero-length animations with timelines修复了粒子，声音，事件的循环，non-zero-length 带时间轴的动画Fixed a syntax error issue when running the /xp command with levels修复了当运行/xp指令时的语法错误问题Fixed an issue with “A Nightmare in Candyland” map which was no longer teleporting players correctly修复了地图A Nightmare in Candyland不能正确地传送玩家



相关地址谷歌正版https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe基岩版测试组安卓Google Play：https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Store：https://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/xbox-insider-hub/9nblggh68vsk

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
